title.label: Amazing app - some annoying bugs could be fixed

content.label: It‚Äôs a great app with lots of variations of meditation. Would recommend to anyone especially since it‚Äôs free, however there are some bugs that make the app unusable aside from downloaded material. If these minor bugs could be fixed then I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs 5 star worthy.

Honestly I have found medito incredible. Before it I wasn‚Äôt really into the whole ‚Äòmeditation‚Äô thing but my friend recommended it to me and it has been brilliant. I am yet to find a fault and meditating is now something I do and enjoy doing daily. 

Thank you very much medito staff üôèüôè

I heard about meditation about a year ago, but always struggled to keep a consistent habit and didn‚Äôt really understand meditation and mindfulness. I thought if I had thoughts while meditating , I must be meditating wrong or I was just bad at meditation. Since I  downloaded  Medito 2 weeks ago, I have meditated every day. I also found it useful for the wide range of sessions from sleep to mindfulness to grief meditation and the daily meditation provides you with something new every day. I found it extremely useful to be able to do a short session of 3 minutes to help build up my meditation practice and the beginner courses have been very informative and relaxing as well as helping to grasp the basics of meditation. However, occasionally the servers go down so I would recommend downloading some sessions and turn your  phone onto airplane mode to see your downloaded sessions of the servers are down .

I‚Äôm going to give this beautiful app five stars, because it truly deserves it. It is free and has really helped my sleep. And the app is free so you can obviously not expect perfection. Every now and then the app has just stopped working for me, but it was fine the next day. Sometimes the ‚Äòbackground sounds‚Äô don‚Äôt stop and just okay throughout the night after my meditation has finished. Over all though this app really has changed my life and I am so grateful for you Medito
Xx

content.label: I want to start meditating more because I feel so calm after it, no stress about messing up or what‚Äôs to come, I‚Äôm just present.

title.label: One of the best apps on my phone

content.label: I never had written a review for any app before, but I think Medito deserves some appreciation. I have noticed my well-being improve from meditating consistently and using the different packs available to further my meditation practice. Medito has allowed me to learn skills that will aid me for the rest of my life. Thank you for this brilliant app, much love.

title.label: Helped me start my meditation journey

content.label: I‚Äôve know about meditation for years and have always wanted to get involved. However the fact that every other app out there is paid I didn‚Äôt want to commit as I might not have liked it. With medito I started my journey over 2 months ago I‚Äôve decreased my anxiety and depression feelings by a mile. And now I am preaching to everyone about meditation. As a young guy struggling with many addictions medito has helped me cut a lot of them out and I‚Äôm going to cut the last one out now too it‚Äôs a slow process but worth it. Highly recommend medito!
Been fix thank you

I don‚Äôt usually leave reviews, but medito is the app that made me to start something that I thought would be too overwhelming to get into. I didn‚Äôt know what to actually do while meditating, but their guidance has helped me a lot.

This app is perfect! It‚Äôs completely free as it‚Äôs a non-profit. There are loading issues frequently, however, this is due to the amount of people trying to get onto the app and they only have volunteers to fix the problem rather than employees . Although, they will notify you when issues occur, so you don‚Äôt think your phone is broken üòÇ. Overall, it‚Äôs a perfect app. It has many courses which are perfect for people starting meditation like I used to be as it teaches you everything you need to know and you‚Äôll pick up the skill very quickly. 

It‚Äôs a great app made by great people. Would highly recommend!

Thank you for providing this excellent, free app. There have been some recent loading issues but these have been addressed promptly and are definitely the exception rather than usual experience. I have been using the app for regularly for more than a year and can always find something to suit my needs.

title.label: Best meditation app with no annoying subscriptions!

content.label: Amazing

Thank you for fixing that problem with loading the screen, I‚Äôve changed my review to 5 stars because I appreciate your objective of bringing meditation to the masses and making it free for everyone. Thank you for creating the Medito app, have a nice life.
Best part about this app is that there are no premium features to unlock or buy and fully free.

I love this app and recommend it to anyone looking to get started on meditation. It‚Äôs great that it‚Äôs available 100% for free and I‚Äôm very grateful to those who‚Äôve developed it and continue to work on it and make it better.

This app is a life changer, with high quality meditation for every situation and lessons to help beginners to get started I can‚Äôt recommend it enough. Although it has issues here and there they are always fixed and you can‚Äôt blame them as they are totally free and are funded by donations.

I love this app. It‚Äôs useful and free!

They‚Äôve had some loading issues in jan 2023 and I guess that‚Äôs what happens when tens of thousands of people take up meditating as a new year‚Äôs resolution and turn to a comprehensive free app. So I couldn‚Äôt load this one day and went to YouTube for a guided meditation instead

Let me tell you JUST show annoying that was. Saccharine, sickly sweet, annoying voice, random interjections when the voice SAID they were going to leave me to meditate. 

I am so so relieved that the app is back today and I can go back to my regular calm sensible person and I can progress through again. I really appreciate how hard these folks are working to provide something free and fix the problems at speed. 

Consider donating to them if you want things fixed faster :)

Meditation has vastly improved my mental state, emotional and spiritual.
the only problem i have with this app is the long loading times, apart from that, the free meditation this app provides is honestly great and getting into the habit has been a positive change in my life
Very good but app can play up a bit
